<js>
function createSign(params) {
	var str = '';
	Object.keys(params).sort().forEach((key) => {
		if (params[key]) {
			str += `&${key}=${params[key]}`;
		}
	});
	return CryptoJS.HmacMD5(str.slice(1), 'c17DTXDNhSc0ea9AQMdUUQ==').toString();
}

const timestamp = Date.now();
let url = "https://api.next.bspapp.com/client";
let body = {
	"method": "serverless.auth.user.anonymousAuthorize",
	"params": "{}",
	"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
	"timestamp": timestamp
};

let sign = createSign(body);

let headers = {
	"Content-Type": "application/json",
	"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
	"x-serverless-sign": sign
};

let response = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body),headers).body());

if(response.success){
	const accessToken = response.data.accessToken;
	const idValue = baseUrl.match(/id=([^&]+)/)[1];

	const timestamp1 = Date.now();
	const params = JSON.stringify({
		"functionTarget": "DCloud-clientDB",
		"functionArgs": {
			"command": {
				"$db": [
					{ "$method": "collection", "$param": ["bl-time-novel"] },
					{ "$method": "where", "$param": [`_id=='${idValue}'`] },
					{ "$method": "field", "$param": ["_id,cover_url,title,tags,word_number,view_count,excerpt,introduction,creator_id,creator_name,creator_avatar,is_completed,novel_status,contributor"] },
					{ "$method": "skip", "$param": [0] },
					{ "$method": "limit", "$param": [20] },
					{ "$method": "get", "$param": [{}] }
				]
			}
		}
	});
	let body1 = {
		"method": "serverless.function.runtime.invoke",
		"params": params,
		"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
		"timestamp": timestamp1,
		"token": accessToken
	};
	let sign1 = createSign(body1);
	let headers1 = {
		"Content-Type": "application/json",
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
		"x-basement-token": accessToken,
		"x-serverless-sign": sign1
	};
	let response1 = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body1),headers1).body());
	
	const timestamp2 = Date.now();
	const params2 = JSON.stringify({
	  "functionTarget": "DCloud-clientDB",

		"command": {
		  "$db": [
			{ "$method": "collection", "$param": ["bl-time-chapter"] },
			{ "$method": "where", "$param": ["novel_id=='" + idValue + "'&&chapter_status==1"] },
			{ "$method": "field", "$param": ["_id,chapter_title,last_modify_date"] },
			{ "$method": "orderBy", "$param": ["chapter_index asc"] },
			{ "$method": "skip", "$param": [0] },
			{ "$method": "limit", "$param": [500] },
			{ "$method": "get", "$param": [{}] }
		  ]
		}
	  }
	});
	let body2 = {
		"method": "serverless.function.runtime.invoke",
		"params": params2,
		"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
		"timestamp": timestamp2,
		"token": accessToken
	};
	let sign2 = createSign(body2);
	let headers2 = {

	let response2 = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body2),headers2).body());

}result;

headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({

  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)

    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))

res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "æœªåˆ†ç»„": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["æœªåˆ†ç»„"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
  })
  java.log(urls)
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else if(/read_history/.test(baseUrl)) {
  bid = getBookIdFull(result);
  id_list = splitArray(bid, 100);
  let urls = [];
  id_list.forEach(i => {
urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
});
  let resp = {book_info: []}
  urls.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(java.ajax(r)).data)
  })
  result = resp;
} else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
